title: Plat ADC LF Team

embed.description: Shiney / Platinum 5 11LP / 36W 22L Win Ratio 62% / Xayah - 21W 10L Win Ratio 68%, Tristana - 11W 9L Win Ratio 55%, Caitlyn - 11W 9L Win Ratio 55%, Jhin - 8W 5L Win Ratio 62%, Kalista - 6W 4L Win Ratio 60%

body:
Hello to whom reads this,

I've been playing ADC for 4 years now, I have a really good understanding of the bot-lane match ups aswel as mid/late end games. I have a working mic aswel as reliable internet (NBN) and I am extremely flexible with my timezone, I can get online whenever the team needs me. Looking to getting back into the competitive atmosphere, its what I enjoy the most out of league.

Current rank:

Plat 5 Solo/duo
Plat 3 Flex
(I do have a smurf account that I can play on, I have no problems using if need be)

Bit of information about me, I'm a pretty laid-back person I dont get mad if people make mistakes because in the end its only a game, if I have a gold/silver support I can help develop them to form a well rounded bot-lane.

if you think I am right fit for your team send me an add "Shiney" {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
